column5: Just mailed deposit for 2015 Melchett Lake. Have 6 going with a newbie to spring fishing on Melchett. Have assured him it would be GREAT. He was there in July and thought it was great. I told him he hasn't seen anything yet. Get your reservations in for your favorite lake for 2015. US dollar is worth a bit more than the "LOONIE" so trip will be somewhat cheaper.
